name: Cauldron Crashers
description:
Enter the wacky world of cauldron crashers!

Team up with your friends to harvest magical ingredients and brew amazing potions in a crazy outdoor garden.  🌲🌊🥂🍷🌲

2 - 4 players 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦

Ingredients
🎃 Pumpkin
🍀 Four leaf clover
🐍 Snake venom
🍁 Silver tree leaf
👀 Frankenstein's eyes (the monster, not the doctor duh 😉)

Potions (10 - WILDCARD 😎)
💀 Liquid Death
🌠 Felix Felicis
👹 Troll Ale
🎮 G-Fuel
🍔 Hangover cure
💚Antidote
⛪ Jesus
📺 Boomer Vision
🐢 Slowness
👴 God-Mode

Controls - Gamepad (keyboard support not guaranteed)

InputActionLeft JoyMoveA / XInteract / Pick up / Throw

This game was made for the AAU fall 2022 game jam
The theme was "Harvest" and the wildcard was the number "10"
